com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.sources

Class GeoJsonSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.sources.Source
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.sources.GeoJsonSource

  • @UiThread
public class GeoJsonSource
extends Source
    A GeoJson source. Exposes a FeatureCollection from Json.
    See Also:
    the style specification
